Finally , utilization investigator use claim outpatient visit data ( extent electronic health record ( EHR ) data becomes available ) identify patient disproportionate visit intensity . The approach describe patient within group categorize patient decile utilize multivariate regression model identify demographic , clinical , socioeconomic , geographic characteristic associate presence top decile along metric . They use CareMore inpatient , outpatient , skilled nursing facility ( SNF ) , inpatient rehabilitation facility ( IRF ) , facility , pharmacy , post-acute care claim Center Medicare Medicaid ( CMS ) Fee-For-Service ( FFS ) data match geography . They perform retrospective analysis claim data .
